Description: Web programming language for interactive and dynamic content on the client side.
JavaScript-based end-to-end testing framework for web applications.
Human-driven testing process where testers execute tests without automation tools, assessing software functionality, usability, and other aspects.
Aiding in creating, executing, and automating requests to validate responses and assess performance.
Able to make graphQL tests to validate endpoint functionality
Using simple queries and able to modify documents in order to retrieve or create test Data

Effective collaboration between Quality Assurance (QA) professionals, development teams, and other stakeholders to ensure clear understanding, efficient issue resolution, and seamless progress in the software testing process.
